name: Working Class
overview:
Working Class is an American television sitcom created by Jill Cargerman, which premiered on CMT on January 28, 2011. The network ordered twelve episodes for the comedy, which is the first scripted series for the network.

On April 11, 2011, CMT cancelled Working Class after only one season due to low ratings.

episodes.name: The Buddy System
episodes.overview: Carli's old flame from high school shows up hoping to re-ignite his "spark" with Carli -- even if means humiliating her in front of her new boss. Special guest Ben King.

episodes.name: Dental Claims
episodes.overview: Carli dates her lovelorn dentist in the hopes of reducing Scott's dental bill, while Nick uses Will's play date to hook up with a hot mom. Special guest Ryan Stiles.

episodes.name: Sugar Mama
episodes.overview: Carli feels threatened when her ex-husband's new "sugar mama" tries to buy her kids' affection with expensive gifts. Special guests Reba McEntire and John Schneider.

episodes.name: Eye For An Eye
episodes.overview: When tensions rise between Carli and her neighbor, Hank, she decides to get to the bottom of the disturbing rumors about him.

episodes.name: Lunch Lady
episodes.overview: Carli's lesson in non-judgmental behavior backfires when she invites her kids' bawdy lunch lady to dinner. Special guest Kathy Kinney.

episodes.name: Pay Back
episodes.overview: Scott takes a job at Parker Foods where his irresponsible behavior threatens to wreck Carli's much-anticipated spa night.

episodes.name: The Dance
episodes.overview: When Carli chaperones the school dance, she must put aside flirting with her boss to save her daughter from humiliation.

episodes.name: Wine Pairing
episodes.overview: Carli's boss, Rob, invites her to an educational wine expo, which she's determined to turn into a first date.

episodes.name: B-Day Invasion
episodes.overview: When Carli's fight with her brother Nick escalates, her ex-Marine neighbor Hank offers to organize Will's birthday party.

episodes.name: Medieval Woman
episodes.overview: Carli gets more than she bargained for when her man-eater mother takes Pam to a renaissance fair. Guest stars: Lesley Ann Warren and Evan Farmer.

episodes.name: Short, then Sweet
episodes.overview: Carli brings an internet date to Rob's housewarming party, hoping to prove what a catch she is.

episodes.name: Hire Education
episodes.overview: Carli learns her son is embarrassed by her deli job at the local grocery stor
